div.p: Pierrepont School was named the winner of the Northeast Elementary division of the Trex Plastic Film Recycling Challenge. We competed against 723 other schools and were able to recycle 2,246 pounds of plastic! Thank you to all members of the Rutherford community who participated in the challenge. A special thank you to Mr. Bach, Mrs. Singer, and the Pierrepont Green Team for coordinating the project. … [Read More...] about Pierrepont School Wins Recycling Challenge

article.class: post-4138 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district-information entry

h2.a: Online Read Alouds Continue With New Books!

div.p:
Welcome back from Spring Break!
Mr. Ersalesi, the supervisor of English and Arts for the Rutherford Public Schools, will continue to read aloud to students each day during our virtual instruction.
For younger students, Mr. Ersalesi will continue to read one picture book per day. They will be added to this YouTube Playlist daily.
For older students, Mr. Ersalesi will be reading several chapters from a novel each day.
[Read More...] about Online Read Alouds Continue With New Books!
